    • Method Detail

      • setStartAndGoal

        public void setStartAndGoal(IntPoint startPoint,
                   IntPoint goalPoint,
                   int goalRadius)
        This method sets a new start and goal position. It initialises the tree and must therefore be called before any other method. Calling this method again will clear any previous data held in the tree before setting the new start and goal position. The goalRadius is used to create a circle around the goal when the tree is drawn in the GUI. The goal is considered to have been attained when the end point of a transition falls within the circle.
        Parameters:
        startPoint - The initial position of the robot.
        goalPoint - The goal position to be attained.
        goalRadius - Defined a circle around the goal within which a valid path must end.

      • addNode

        public final void addNode(RRNode parent,
           IntPoint coordinates)
        Adds a new node representing the given coordinates. The node is attached as a child node of the given parent.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent node.
        coordinates - The coordinates of the new (child) node.

      • getNearestNeighbour

        public RRNode getNearestNeighbour(IntPoint queryPoint)
        Returns the node closest to the given query point.
        Parameters:
        queryPoint - The point of which the nearest neighbour is to be found
        Returns:
        The nearest neighbour.

      • getPathFromRootTo

        public java.util.ArrayList<IntPoint> getPathFromRootTo(RRNode lastNode)
        Returns an ArrayList of IntPoint objects representing the path from the root node to the specified node.
        Parameters:
        lastNode - The node for which the path is to be returned.
